TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ImageOrientation extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how multiple images are arranged in a single image file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageOrientation> values represent the return values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method when it is called with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageOrientation Horizontal = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Images are arranged horizontally in the multiple-image file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageOrientation Vertical = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Images are arranged vertically in the multiple-image file.
